name: Incident Laser Tag
description:
First Person Shooter set in an office building.  You are an IT Analyst who has to defeat Incidents by shooting them with your laser gun.

Controls:
Mouse - look around
W, S, A, & D - Move forward, left, right and backwards
Right Mouse Button - Fire
Mouse Wheel - Cycle through your Weapons
Buttons 1, 2 and 3 Select Weapon
Spacebar - Jump
